programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
   create          principal a "a" 
   create          principal c "c"
   set x = "msg"
   set delegation x admin read -> a
   set delegation x admin delegate -> a
   return x
***

as principal a password "a" do
   set delegation x a read -> c
   return "ok" 
***

as principal a password "a" do
   delete delegation x a read -> c
   return "ok" 
***

as principal c password "c" do
   return x 
***
